COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults

COMMAND.name: no debug all
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/all/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/all/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/app_debug/all/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/ptp_debug/all/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/ssm_debug/all/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/ospf_all/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_all/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/igmp_all/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/mroute_on/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcp_debug/all/0 dhcpv6pid=`pgrep -x dhclient6` if [ $dhcpv6pid ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcpv6_debug/all/0 fi cdbctl update/cdb/debug/authd_debug/all/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/all/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_all/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/ip_icmp/0 cdbctl update/cdb/l2/dot1x_global/dot1x_packet/0 cdbctl update/cdb/l2/dot1x_global/dot1x_protocol/0 cdbctl update/cdb/l2/dot1x_global/dot1x_timer/0 cdbctl update/cdb/l2/dot1x_global/dot1x_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/l2/sflow_global/sflow_all/0 vtysh -c "no debug ospf" -c "no debug pim" -c "no debug pim zebra" -c "no debug igmp" -c "no debug mroute" -c "no debug mroute detail" cdbctl update/cdb/app/ntp_cfg/debug_level/crit pid=`pgrep ovs-vswitchd` if [ $pid ]; then ovs-appctl vlog/set vconn:syslog:err cdbctl update/cdb/debug/openflow_debug/openflow_vconn/0 ovs-appctl vlog/set rconn:syslog:err cdbctl update/cdb/debug/openflow_debug/openflow_rconn/0 fi

COMMAND.name: debug ntp
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/app/ntp_cfg/debug_level/${level} cdbctl update/cdb/debug/app_debug/ntp_debug_level/1
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to specify debugging options for NTP. Use this command without parameters to turn on all the options. Use the no parameter with this command to disable this function.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: Use this command to specify debugging options for NTP. Use this command without parameters to turn on all the options. Use the no parameter with this command to disable this function.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set NTP debug on: Switch# debug ntp info

COMMAND.name: no debug ntp
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/app/ntp_cfg/debug_level/crit cdbctl update/cdb/debug/app_debug/ntp_debug_level/0
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging NTP.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set NTP debug on: Switch# debug ntp info

COMMAND.name: debug arp
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arp_event/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arp_packet/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arp_protocol/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arp_timer/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arp_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging arp.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging arp all: Switch# debug arp all

COMMAND.name: no debug arp
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arp_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arp_packet/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arp_protocol/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arp_timer/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arp_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging arp.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging arp all: Switch# no debug arp all

COMMAND.name: debug route
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/route_ipv4/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/route_ipv6/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/route_netlink/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/route_${type}/1 fi

COMMAND.name: no debug route
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/route_ipv4/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/route_ipv6/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/route_netlink/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/route_${type}/0 fi

COMMAND.name: debug ipv6 nd
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/nd_event/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/nd_packet/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/nd_protocol/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/nd_timer/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/nd_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging nd.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging nd all: Switch# debug nd all

COMMAND.name: no debug ipv6 nd
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/nd_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/nd_packet/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/nd_protocol/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/nd_timer/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/nd_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging nd.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging nd all: Switch# no debug nd all

COMMAND.name: debug vrrp
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_events/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_packet_recv/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_packet_send/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_packet_detail/1 else if [ "events" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_${type}/1 else if [ "all" == ${pkt} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_packet_recv/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_packet_send/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_packet_detail/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_${type}_${pkt}/1 fi fi fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging vrrp.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging vrrp all: Switch# debug vrrp all

COMMAND.name: no debug vrrp
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_events/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_packet_recv/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_packet_send/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_packet_detail/0 else if [ "events" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_${type}/0 else if [ "all" == ${pkt} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_packet_recv/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_packet_send/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_packet_detail/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/vrrp_${type}_${pkt}/0 fi fi fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging vrrp.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging vrrp all: Switch# no debug vrrp all

COMMAND.name: debug arp-inspection
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arpinspection_event/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arpinspection_packet/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arpinspection_protocol/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arpinspection_timer/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arpinspection_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging arp inspection.
COMMAND.CTCDEFAULT: Default debugging arp inspection is disable.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging arp inspection all: Switch# debug arpinspection all

COMMAND.name: no debug arp-inspection
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arpinspection_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arpinspection_packet/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arpinspection_protocol/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arpinspection_timer/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/arpinspection_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging arp inspection.
COMMAND.CTCDEFAULT: Default debugging arp inspection is disable.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging arp inspection all: Switch# no debug arpinspection all

COMMAND.name: debug ip icmp
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/ip_icmp/1
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging IP ICMP.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging IP ICMP: Switch# debug ip icmp

COMMAND.name: no debug ip icmp
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/ip_icmp/0
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging IP ICMP.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging IP ICMP: Switch# no debug ip icmp

COMMAND.name: debug ipsla
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/ipsla_event/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/ipsla_packet/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/ipsla_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging IP-SLA.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging IP-SLA all: Switch# debug ipsla all

COMMAND.name: no debug ipsla
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/ipsla_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/ipsla_packet/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/ipsla_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging IP-SLA.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging IP-SLA all: Switch# no debug ipsla all

COMMAND.name: debug track
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/track_event/1
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging track.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging track all: Switch# debug track all

COMMAND.name: no debug track
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/track_event/0
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging track.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging track all: Switch# no debug track all

COMMAND.name: debug snmp
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/app_debug/snmp_${type}/1

COMMAND.name: no debug snmp
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/app_debug/snmp_${type}/0

COMMAND.name: debug rmon
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/app_debug/rmon_event/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/app_debug/rmon_alarm/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/app_debug/rmon_stats/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/app_debug/rmon_history/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/app_debug/rmon_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging RMON.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging RMON all: Switch# debug rmon all

COMMAND.name: no debug rmon
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/app_debug/rmon_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/app_debug/rmon_alarm/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/app_debug/rmon_stats/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/app_debug/rmon_history/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/app_debug/rmon_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging RMON.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging RMON all: Switch# no debug rmon all

COMMAND.name: debug erps
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/erps_packet/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/erps_protocol/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/erps_timer/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/erps_event/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/erps_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging erps.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging erps all: Switch# debug erps all

COMMAND.name: no debug erps
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/erps_packet/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/erps_protocol/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/erps_timer/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/erps_event/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/erps_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging erps.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging erps all: Switch# no debug erps all

COMMAND.name: debug ssm
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/ssm_debug/ssm_packet_tx/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/ssm_debug/ssm_packet_rx/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/ssm_debug/ssm_timer/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/ssm_debug/ssm_event/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/ssm_debug/ssm_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging ssm.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging ssm all: Switch# debug ssm all

COMMAND.name: no debug ssm
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/ssm_debug/ssm_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/ssm_debug/ssm_packet_tx/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/ssm_debug/ssm_packet_rx/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/ssm_debug/ssm_timer/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/ssm_debug/ssm_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging ssm.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging ssm all: Switch# no debug ssm all

COMMAND.name: debug g8032
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/g8032_event/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/g8032_packet_tx/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/g8032_packet_rx/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/g8032_timer/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/g8032_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging ssm.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging ssm all: Switch# debug ssm all

COMMAND.name: no debug g8032
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/g8032_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/g8032_packet_tx/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/g8032_packet_rx/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/g8032_timer/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/g8032_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging ssm.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging ssm all: Switch# no debug ssm all

COMMAND.name: debug ipsg
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/ipsg_event/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/ipsg_error/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/ipsg_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging IP source guard.
COMMAND.CTCDEFAULT: Default debugging IP source guard is disable.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging IP source guard all: Switch# debug igsp all

COMMAND.name: no debug ipsg
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/ipsg_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/ipsg_error/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/ipsg_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging IP source guard.
COMMAND.CTCDEFAULT: Default debugging IP source guard is disable.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging IP source guard all: Switch# no debug ipsg all

COMMAND.name: debug lacp
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lacp_event/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lacp_packet/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lacp_protocol/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lacp_timer/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lacp_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging lacp.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: You can choose debug lacp type packet, status machine or all these types.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to use this command: Swtich# debug lacp all

COMMAND.name: no debug lacp
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lacp_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lacp_packet/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lacp_protocol/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lacp_timer/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lacp_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging lacp.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: You can choose disable debug lacp packet, status machine or all these types.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to use this command: Swtich# no debug lacp all

COMMAND.name: debug mlag
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/mlag_event/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/mlag_packet/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/mlag_protocol/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/mlag_timer/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/mlag_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging MLAG.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging MLAG all: Switch# debug mlag all

COMMAND.name: no debug mlag
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/mlag_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/mlag_packet/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/mlag_protocol/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/mlag_timer/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/mlag_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging mlag.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging mlag all: Switch# no debug mlag all

COMMAND.name: debug igmp-snooping
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_event/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_packet_tx/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_packet_rx/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_protocol/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_timer/1 elif [ "packet" == ${type} ]; then if [ "all" == ${packet_dir} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_packet_tx/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_packet_rx/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_packet_${packet_dir}/1 fi else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging IGMP snooping.
COMMAND.CTCDEFAULT: Default debugging IGMP snooping is disable.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging IGMP snooping all: Switch# debug igmp-snooping all

COMMAND.name: no debug igmp-snooping
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_packet_tx/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_packet_rx/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_protocol/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_timer/0 elif [ "packet" == ${type} ]; then if [ "all" == ${packet_dir} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_packet_tx/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_packet_rx/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_packet_${packet_dir}/0 fi else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/igsp_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging mlag.
COMMAND.CTCDEFAULT: Default debugging IGMP snooping is disable.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging IGMP snooping all: Switch# no debug igmp-snooping all

COMMAND.name: debug stp
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_event/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_packet_tx/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_packet_rx/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_protocol_cist/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_protocol_msti/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_timer/1 elif [ "packet" == ${type} ]; then if [ "all" == ${packet_dir} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_packet_tx/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_packet_rx/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_packet_${packet_dir}/1 fi elif [ "protocol" == ${type} ]; then if [ "all" == ${subproto} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_protocol_cist/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_protocol_msti/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_protocol_${subproto}/1 fi else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging stp.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging stp all: Switch# debug stp all

COMMAND.name: no debug stp
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_packet_tx/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_packet_rx/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_protocol_cist/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_protocol_msti/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_timer/0 elif [ "packet" == ${type} ]; then if [ "all" == ${packet_dir} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_packet_tx/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_packet_rx/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_packet_${packet_dir}/0 fi elif [ "protocol" == ${type} ]; then if [ "all" == ${subproto} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_protocol_cist/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_protocol_msti/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_protocol_${subproto}/0 fi else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/stp_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging stp.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging stp all: Switch# no debug stp all

COMMAND.name: debug aaa
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/authd_debug/auth_event/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/authd_debug/auth_packet/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/authd_debug/auth_protocol/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/authd_debug/auth_timer/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/authd_debug/auth_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging stp.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging stp all: Switch# debug stp all

COMMAND.name: no debug aaa
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/authd_debug/auth_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/authd_debug/auth_packet/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/authd_debug/auth_protocol/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/authd_debug/auth_timer/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/authd_debug/auth_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging stp.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging stp all: Switch# no debug stp all

COMMAND.name: debug cpu-packet

PARAM.name: macmismatch
PARAM.help: Port-Security Mac Mismatch With Other Port packets

COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_rx/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_tx/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_bpdu/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_slowproto/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_eapol/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_lldp/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_erps/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_macda/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_ospf/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_bgp/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_arp/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_dhcp/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_ipda/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_igmp/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_maclimit/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_macmismatch/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_l3copycpu/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_raw/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_other/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_ptp/1 elif [ "direction" == ${type} ]; then if [ "both" == ${traffic_dir} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_rx/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_tx/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_${traffic_dir}/1 fi else if [ "all" == ${traffic_reason} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_bpdu/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_slowproto/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_eapol/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_lldp/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_erps/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_macda/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_ospf/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_bgp/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_arp/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_dhcp/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_ipda/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_igmp/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_maclimit/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_macmismatch/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_l3copycpu/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_raw/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_other/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_ptp/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_${traffic_reason}/1 fi fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging cpu.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging stp all: Switch# debug cpu all

COMMAND.name: no debug cpu-packet

PARAM.name: macmismatch
PARAM.help: Port-Security Mac Mismatch With Other Port packets

COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_rx/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_tx/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_bpdu/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_slowproto/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_eapol/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_lldp/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_erps/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_macda/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_ospf/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_bgp/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_arp/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_dhcp/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_ipda/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_igmp/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_maclimit/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_macmismatch/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_l3copycpu/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_raw/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_other/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_ptp/0 elif [ "direction" == ${type} ]; then if [ "both" == ${traffic_dir} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_rx/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_tx/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_${traffic_dir}/0 fi else if [ "all" == ${traffic_reason} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_bpdu/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_slowproto/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_eapol/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_lldp/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_erps/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_macda/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_ospf/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_bgp/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_arp/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_dhcp/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_ipda/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_igmp/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_maclimit/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_macmismatch/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_l3copycpu/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_raw/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_other/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_ptp/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/hsrv_debug/cpu_${traffic_reason}/0 fi fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging cpu
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging stp all: Switch# no debug cpu all

COMMAND.name: debug lldp
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_event/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_packet_tx/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_packet_rx/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_protocol/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_timer/1 elif [ "packet" == ${type} ]; then if [ "all" == ${packet_dir} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_packet_tx/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_packet_rx/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_packet_${packet_dir}/1 fi else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging lldp.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging lldp all: Switch# debug lldp all

COMMAND.name: no debug lldp
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_packet_tx/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_packet_rx/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_protocol/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_timer/0 elif [ "packet" == ${type} ]; then if [ "all" == ${packet_dir} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_packet_tx/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_packet_rx/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_packet_${packet_dir}/0 fi else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/lldp_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging lldp.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging lldp all: Switch# no debug lldp all

COMMAND.name: debug rpcapi
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/rpcapi_request/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/rpcapi_command/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/rpcapi_${type}/1 fi

COMMAND.name: no debug rpcapi
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/rpcapi_request/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/rpcapi_command/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/switch_debug/rpcapi_${type}/0 fi

COMMAND.name: debug dot1x
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/l2/dot1x_global/dot1x_packet/1 cdbctl update/cdb/l2/dot1x_global/dot1x_protocol/1 cdbctl update/cdb/l2/dot1x_global/dot1x_timer/1 cdbctl update/cdb/l2/dot1x_global/dot1x_event/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/l2/dot1x_global/dot1x_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to turn on the debug switches of dot1x module.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: Use this command to turn on the debug switches of dot1x module.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging dot1x all: Switch# debug dot1x all

COMMAND.name: no debug dot1x
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/l2/dot1x_global/dot1x_packet/0 cdbctl update/cdb/l2/dot1x_global/dot1x_protocol/0 cdbctl update/cdb/l2/dot1x_global/dot1x_timer/0 cdbctl update/cdb/l2/dot1x_global/dot1x_event/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/l2/dot1x_global/dot1x_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to turn off the debug switches of dot1x module.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: Use this command to turn off the debug switches of dot1x module.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging dot1x all: Switch# no debug dot1x all

COMMAND.name: debug sflow
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/l2/sflow_global/sflow_${type}/1
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to turn on the debug switches of sflow module.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: Use this command to turn on the debug switches of sflow module.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging sflow all: Switch# debug sflow all

COMMAND.name: no debug sflow
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/l2/sflow_global/sflow_${type}/0
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to turn off the debug switches of sflow module.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: Use this command to turn off the debug switches of sflow module.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging sflow all: Switch# no debug sflow all

COMMAND.name: debug dhcp snooping
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${opt} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcp_debug/snooping_packet/1/snooping_event/1/snooping_error/1/snooping_dump/1 elif [ "events" == ${opt} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcp_debug/snooping_event/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcp_debug/snooping_${opt}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to turn on the debug switches of dhcp snooping module. To restore the default, use the no form of this command
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: Use command "terminal monitor" to make debug messages print on the VTY immediately. Use command "show logging buffer" to check the debug messages in the logging buffer.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following is sample to open dhcp snooping debug switches: Switch# debug dhcp snooping all

COMMAND.name: no debug dhcp snooping
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${opt} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcp_debug/snooping_packet/0/snooping_event/0/snooping_error/0/snooping_dump/0 elif [ "events" == ${opt} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcp_debug/snooping_event/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcp_debug/snooping_${opt}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to restore the default of the debug switches of dhcp snooping module.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following is sample to open dhcp snooping debug switches: Switch# no debug dhcp snooping all

COMMAND.name: debug dhcp client
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${opt} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcp_debug/client_packet/1/client_events/1/client_error/1/client_dump/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcp_debug/client_${opt}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to turn on the debug switches of dhcp snooping module. To restore the default, use the no form of this command
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: Use command "terminal monitor" to make debug messages print on the VTY immediately. Use command "show logging buffer" to check the debug messages in the logging buffer.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following is sample to open dhcp snooping debug switches: Switch# debug dhcp snooping all

COMMAND.name: no debug dhcp client
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${opt} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcp_debug/client_packet/0/client_events/0/client_error/0/client_dump/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcp_debug/client_${opt}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to restore the default of the debug switches of dhcp snooping module.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following is sample to open dhcp snooping debug switches: Switch# no debug dhcp snooping all

COMMAND.name: debug dhcp relay
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${opt} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcp_debug/relay_packet/1/relay_events/1/relay_error/1/relay_dump/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcp_debug/relay_${opt}/1 fi

COMMAND.name: no debug dhcp relay
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${opt} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcp_debug/relay_packet/0/relay_events/0/relay_error/0/relay_dump/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcp_debug/relay_${opt}/0 fi

COMMAND.name: debug dhcpv6
COMMAND.help: Dynamic Host Configuration protocol for IPv6

COMMAND.name: no debug dhcpv6
COMMAND.help: Dynamic Host Configuration protocol for IPv6

COMMAND.name: debug dhcpv6 client
COMMAND.ACTION: dhcpv6pid=`pgrep -x dhclient6` if [ $dhcpv6pid ]; then if [ "all" == ${opt} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcpv6_debug/clientv6_packet/1/clientv6_events/1/clientv6_error/1/clientv6_dump/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcpv6_debug/clientv6_${opt}/1 fi fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to turn on the debug switches of dhcpv6 client module. To restore the default, use the no form of this command
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: Use command "terminal monitor" to make debug messages print on the VTY immediately. Use command "show logging buffer" to check the debug messages in the logging buffer.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following is sample to open dhcp snooping debug switches: Switch# debug dhcpv6 client all

COMMAND.name: no debug dhcpv6 client
COMMAND.ACTION: dhcpv6pid=`pgrep -x dhclient6` if [ $dhcpv6pid ]; then if [ "all" == ${opt} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcpv6_debug/clientv6_packet/0/clientv6_events/0/clientv6_error/0/clientv6_dump/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/dhcpv6_debug/clientv6_${opt}/0 fi fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to restore the default of the debug switches of dhcp snooping module.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following is sample to open dhcp snooping debug switches: Switch# no debug dhcpv6 client all

COMMAND.name: debug ospf all
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/ospf_all/1 vtysh -c "debug ospf event" vtysh -c "debug ospf ism" vtysh -c "debug ospf lsa" vtysh -c "debug ospf nsm" vtysh -c "debug ospf nssa" vtysh -c "debug ospf packet all" vtysh -c "debug ospf zebra"
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging OSPF all.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The debug ospf all command enables the display of debug all information related to OSPF .
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set OSPF all debug on: Switch# debug ospf all

COMMAND.name: no debug ospf all
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/ospf_all/0 vtysh -c "no debug ospf event" vtysh -c "no debug ospf ism" vtysh -c "no debug ospf lsa" vtysh -c "no debug ospf nsm" vtysh -c "no debug ospf nssa" vtysh -c "no debug ospf packet all" vtysh -c "no debug ospf zebra"
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging OSFP all.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The no debug ospf all command disables the display of debug all information related to OSPF .
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set OSPF all debug off: Switch# no debug ospf all

COMMAND.name: debug ospf event
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/ospf_event_${detail}/1 if [ "$?" == "0" ]; then vtysh -c "debug ospf event ${detail}" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to specify debugging options for OSPF event troubleshooting. Use this command without parameters to turn on all the options. Use the no parameter with this command to disable this function.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: Use this command to specify debugging options for OSPF event troubleshooting. Use this command without parameters to turn on all the options. Use the no parameter with this command to disable this function.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set OSPF event debug on: Switch# debug ospf event

COMMAND.name: no debug ospf event
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/ospf_event_${detail}/0 if [ "$?" == "0" ]; then vtysh -c "no debug ospf event ${detail}" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use the no parameter with this command to disable this function.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: Use the no parameter with this command to disable this function.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set OSPF event debug off: Switch# no debug ospf event

COMMAND.name: debug ospf ism
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/ospf_ism_${ismdetail}/1 if [ "$?" == "0" ]; then vtysh -c "debug ospf ism ${ismdetail}" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to specify debugging options for OSPF Interface State Machine (ISM) troubleshooting. Use the no parameter with this command to disable this function.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The debug ospf ism command enables the display of debug information related to the Interface State Machine (ISM).
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set OSPF ism event debug on: Switch#debug ospf ism events

COMMAND.name: no debug ospf ism
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/ospf_ism_${ismdetail}/0 if [ "$?" == "0" ]; then vtysh -c "no debug ospf ism ${ismdetail}" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use the no parameter with this command to disable this function.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The no debug ospf ism command disables the display of debug information related to the Interface State Machine (ISM).
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set OSPF ism event debug off: Switch# no debug ospf ism events

COMMAND.name: debug ospf lsa
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/ospf_lsa_${lsadetail}/1 if [ "$?" == "0" ]; then vtysh -c "debug ospf lsa ${lsadetail}" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to specify debugging options for OSPF Link State Advertisements (LSA) troubleshooting. Use the no parameter with this command to disable this function.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The debug ospf lsa command enables the display of debug information related to internal operations of LSAs.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set OSPF lsa debug on: Switch# debug ospf lsa

COMMAND.name: no debug ospf lsa
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/ospf_lsa_${lsadetail}/0 if [ "$?" == "0" ]; then vtysh -c "no debug ospf lsa ${lsadetail}" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use the no parameter with this command to disable this function.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The no debug ospf lsa command disables the display of debug information related to internal operations of LSAs.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set OSPF lsa debug off: Switch# no debug ospf lsa

COMMAND.name: debug ospf nsm
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/ospf_nsm_${nsmdetail}/1 if [ "$?" == "0" ]; then vtysh -c "debug ospf nsm ${nsmdetail}" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to specify debugging options for OSPF Neighbor State Machine (NSM) troubleshooting. Use the no parameter with this command to disable this function.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The debug ospf nfsm command enables the display of debug information related to the Neighbor State Machine (NSM).
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set OSPF nsm timers debug on: Switch#debug ospf nsm timers

COMMAND.name: no debug ospf nsm
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/ospf_nsm_${nsmdetail}/0 if [ "$?" == "0" ]; then vtysh -c "no debug ospf nsm ${nsmdetail}" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use the no parameter with this command to disable this function.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The no debug ospf nfsm command disables the display of debug information related to the Neighbor State Machine (NSM).
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set OSPF nsm timers debug off: Switch# no debug ospf nsm timers

COMMAND.name: debug ospf packet
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/ospf_packet_${packetdetail}/1 if [ "$?" == "0" ]; then vtysh -c "debug ospf packet ${packetdetail}" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to specify debugging options for OSPF packets. Use the no parameter with this command to disable this function.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The debug ospf packet command enables the display of debug information related to the sending and receiving of packets.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set OSPF packet dd debug on: Switch# debug ospf packet dd

COMMAND.name: no debug ospf packet
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/ospf_packet_${packetdetail}/0 if [ "$?" == "0" ]; then vtysh -c "no debug ospf packet ${packetdetail}" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use the no parameter with this command to disable this function.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The no debug ospf packet command disables the display of debug information related to the sending and receiving of packets.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set OSPF packet dd debug off: Switch# no debug ospf packet dd

COMMAND.name: debug ospf zebra
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/ospf_zebra_${zebradetail}/1 if [ "$?" == "0" ]; then vtysh -c "debug ospf zebra ${zebradetail}" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging of ospf zebra.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The debug ospf zebra command enables the display of debug information related to the ospf interface or redistribute of zebra.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set OSPF zebra interface debug on: Switch# debug ospf zebra interface

COMMAND.name: no debug ospf zebra
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/ospf_zebra_${zebradetail}/0 if [ "$?" == "0" ]; then vtysh -c "no debug ospf zebra ${zebradetail}" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use the no parameter with this command to disable this function.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The no debug ospf zebra command disables the display of debug information related to the ospf interface or redistribute of zebra.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set OSPF zebra interface debug off: Switch# no debug ospf zebra interface

COMMAND.name: debug igmp
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${mode} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/igmp_event/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/igmp_packet/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/igmp_trace/1 vtysh -c "debug igmp" else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/igmp_${mode}/1 vtysh -c "debug igmp ${mode}" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging igmp switch on.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The debug ospf all command enables the display of debug all information related to igmp .
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set igmp all debug on: Switch# debug igmp

COMMAND.name: no debug igmp
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${mode} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/igmp_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/igmp_packet/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/igmp_trace/0 vtysh -c "no debug igmp" else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/igmp_${mode}/0 vtysh -c "no debug igmp ${mode}" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging igmp all.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The no debug igmp all command disables the display of debug all information related to igmp .
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set igmp all debug off: Switch# no debug igmp

COMMAND.name: debug mroute
COMMAND.help: PIM interaction with kernel MFC cache
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/mroute_${mode}/1 if [ "on" == ${mode} ]; then vtysh -c "debug mroute" else vtysh -c "debug mroute detail" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging mroute interaction with kernel MFC cache switch on.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The debug ospf all command enables the display of debug all information related to mroute interaction with kernel MFC .
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set mroute interaction with kernel MFC debug on: Switch# debug mroute

COMMAND.name: no debug mroute
COMMAND.help: PIM interaction with kernel MFC cache
COMMAND.ACTION: cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/mroute_${mode}/0 if [ "on" == ${mode} ]; then vtysh -c "no debug mroute" else vtysh -c "no debug mroute detail" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging mroute interaction with kernel MFC.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The no debug igmp all command disables the display of debug all information related to mroute interaction with kernel MFC .
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set mroute interaction with kernel MFC debug off: Switch# no debug igmp

COMMAND.name: debug pim
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${mode} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_event/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_packet/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_trace/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_packetdump_receive/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_packetdump_send/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_zebra/1 vtysh -c "debug pim event" vtysh -c "debug pim packet" 2 > /dev/null vtysh -c "debug pim trace" vtysh -c "debug pim packet-dump receive" vtysh -c "debug pim packet-dump send" vtysh -c "debug pim zebra" elif [ "packet-dump" == ${mode} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_packetdump_${dump_mode}/1 vtysh -c "debug pim packet-dump ${dump_mode}" else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_${mode}/1 vtysh -c "debug pim ${mode}" 2 > /dev/null fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging pim switch on.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The debug ospf all command enables the display of debug all information related to pim .
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set pim all debug on: Switch# debug pim

COMMAND.name: no debug pim
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${mode} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_packet/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_trace/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_zebra/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_packetdump_receive/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_packetdump_send/0 vtysh -c "no debug pim" vtysh -c "no debug pim zebra" vtysh -c "no debug pim packet-dump receive" vtysh -c "no debug pim packet-dump send" elif [ "packet-dump" == ${mode} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_packetdump_${dump_mode}/0 vtysh -c "no debug pim packet-dump ${dump_mode}" else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/quagga_debug/pim_${mode}/0 vtysh -c "no debug pim ${mode}" fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging pim all.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: The no debug pim all command disables the display of debug all information related to pim .
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example set pim all debug off: Switch# no debug pim

COMMAND.name: debug nat
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/nat_event/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/nat_timer/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/nat_${type}/1 fi

COMMAND.name: no debug nat
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/nat_event/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/nat_timer/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/nat_${type}/0 fi

COMMAND.name: show debugging

PARAM.name: dhcpv6
PARAM.help: Dynamic Host Configuration protocol for IPv6

PARAM.name: mroute
PARAM.help: PIM interaction with kernel MFC cache

COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: To display the debugging status, use the show debugging command in EXEC mode.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: Use this command to display the debugging status.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following is sample output from the show debugging command: DUT1# show debugging stp Module SubModule Type Status ------------+----------------+--------------------+------ switch stp event on stp packet tx on stp packet rx on stp proto cist on stp proto msti on stp timer on

COMMAND.name: debug cfm
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/cfm_all/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/cfm_${type}/1 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging cfm.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging cfm all: Switch# debug cfm all

COMMAND.name: no debug cfm
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/cfm_packet/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/cfm_timer/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/cfm_event/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/opm_debug/cfm_${type}/0 fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging cfm.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging cfm all: Switch# no debug cfm all

COMMAND.name: debug pimsm
COMMAND.help: Protocol Independent Multicast Sparse Mode (PIM SM)
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/pimsm_pim/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/pimsm_igmp/1 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/pimsm_timer/1 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/pimsm_${type}/1 fi sendmsg "debug pimsm enable ${type} "
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable debugging pim.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to enable debugging pim all: Switch# debug pim all

COMMAND.name: no debug pimsm
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "all" == ${type} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/pimsm_pim/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/pimsm_igmp/0 cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/pimsm_timer/0 else cdbctl update/cdb/debug/route_debug/pimsm_${type}/0 fi sendmsg "debug pimsm disable ${type} "
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable debugging pimsm.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: In the following example shows how to disable debugging pimsm all: Switch# no debug pimsm all
